faqs.question: Who owns the code/design after project completion?
faqs.answer: By default, Pink Ponk retains full intellectual property rights. However, if full ownership is your priority, we offer custom licensing options so you can own the code for an additional fee. Let's discuss what works best for your business.

faqs.question: What if I need more time to make a payment?
faqs.answer: We understand that cash flow can vary. If you need extra time, just let us know and we’ll work out a flexible payment arrangement to keep your project on track.

faqs.question: Do you offer post-launch support?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We provide 30 days of complimentary post-launch support to address any issues, and after that, we offer scalable support plans tailored to your ongoing needs.

faqs.question: How do I get started?
faqs.answer: Getting started is simple—contact us to schedule a consultation. We’ll guide you through our discovery, planning, and development process to bring your vision to life.

faqs.question: What makes your service different from competitors?
faqs.answer: We combine technical expertise with creative problem-solving and transparent communication. Our approach focuses on long-term partnerships and measurable business growth, ensuring that your project stands out.

faqs.question: What is the typical project timeline?
faqs.answer: While timelines vary based on project scope, we pride ourselves on efficient delivery. After an initial consultation, we provide a detailed timeline tailored to your project, ensuring clarity from start to finish.

faqs.question: How is the pricing structured?
faqs.answer: Our pricing is flexible and transparent with no hidden fees. We tailor our plans to meet your specific needs and budget—whether you require a fixed-price project or a subscription-based model.

faqs.question: How do you ensure quality and security?
faqs.answer: We follow rigorous quality assurance processes and industry best practices for security. Our team continuously tests and updates our deliverables, ensuring high performance and robust data protection.

faqs.question: What happens if I want to cancel or change the project scope?
faqs.answer: We understand that needs can change. We require a 7-day notice for cancellations and work closely with you to adjust the project scope as needed. Our goal is to maintain a fair and transparent process at all times.

faqs.question: Can I customize or resell the software you build?
faqs.answer: Our standard deliverables are designed for your exclusive use. However, if you need additional customization or the rights to resell the software, we offer custom licensing arrangements tailored to your business requirements.
